overview:
SleekFly gathers current news information, rich images and informative videos from sources around the world and we display it in a time saving, brief summary and format.

Our staffs written articles are combined with user created content. Users can advance from article writing and content creation to building their own blog over time. This approach allows SleekFly to publish the most diverse, unbiased news, information and editorial content available.

Users of the SleekFly network can socialize with members that share their same interests amongst the various â€œSleekâ€ categories; Lifestyle, Gossip, Automotive, Style, Tech, and more. Join us and â€œflyâ€ with friends that enjoy what you enjoy.

Sleekstore, our e-shopping store coming in February 2010, is a showcase for incredible products from the best retailers. See it all in one place; make a choice and checkout with confidence!

We believe life can be just too darn serious. Our daily mission at SleekFly is to give our readers and users a place to, escape, have fun, be creative and relate positively!
